sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnrecentsrchwrdmanage ( SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID /* */ , SRCHWRD_MANAGE_NM /* */ , SRCHWRD_CONECT_URL /* */ , USER_SEARCH_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #srchwrdManageId# /* */ , #srchwrdManageNm# /* */ , #srchwrdConectUrl# /* */ , #userSearchAt# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnrecentsrchwrdmanage SET SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID=#srchwrdManageId# /* */ , SRCHWRD_MANAGE_NM=#srchwrdManageNm# /* */ , SRCHWRD_CONECT_URL=#srchwrdConectUrl# /* */ , USER_SEARCH_AT=#userSearchAt# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID=#srchwrdManageId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID /* */ , SRCHWRD_MANAGE_NM /* */ , SRCHWRD_CONECT_URL /* */ , USER_SEARCH_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnrecentsrchwrdmanage WHERE SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID=#srchwrdManageId# /* */

SELECT SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID /* */ , SRCHWRD_MANAGE_NM /* */ , SRCHWRD_CONECT_URL /* */ , USER_SEARCH_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnrecentsrchwrdmanage WHERE 1=1
SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
SRCHWRD_MANAGE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnrecentsrchwrdmanage WHERE 1=1
SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
SRCHWRD_MANAGE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
